title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Oct 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Oct 4 2022
description:
As Dems run from BLM, Kanye West makes a political fashion statement by wearing a White Lives Matter T-shirt at a fashion show. Buck says, "I've never been invited to the Paris fashion shows, which is really a slap in the face because I'm all about the T-shirts, I'm all about the sweatshirts." Clay's German and Russian film recommendations from a memorable totalitarian-themed college cinema class he took. Twitter stock soars on report Elon Musk will go through with deal to buy the company. Clay says, "I hope if you had Twitter stock, you didn't sell it." Howard Stern goes out to dinner for first time since covid. C&B say, "He's Dr. Fauci now. He's the man. It's pathetic." New dating trend? Demanding Venmo payments for cancelled dates. Clay says Buck's engaged now, but maybe he'll owe for 20 years of being a single man in NYC.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
